.b-sch-event.title: Events
.b-sch-event.content: Clicking an event highlights the marker it represents on the map

.mapboxgl-marker.title: Map markers
.mapboxgl-marker.content: Clicking a marker highlights the event it represents in the schedule

.b-slidetoggle.title: Unscheduled events
.b-slidetoggle.content: Click slide toggle to reveal unscheduled events, which you can drag onto the schedule
